page.title: 15LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: We interviewed people using a questionnaire asking what their favourite pastime was. Reading is the most popular activity. No one that we interviewed like horse riding. Most people seemed to like pastimes they could do around the house. We think this is because they don't need to pay a lot of money to do them. Swimming is popular in Alnwick because there is a pool in the town. We asked what other activities people liked doing which weren't on the list. Other pastimes inculded macrame, watching tropical fish, wine and beer making and roller skating. Suggestions to improve the leisure facilities inculded adding a cinema, park, museum, putting green and a really good sports centre.
